sent.text: Female patients diagnosed with erbB2+ breast cancer .
ErbB2 positivity will be as determined by respective institutional standards , and will be based on medical history only .
Brain metastasis diagnosis made between January 2006 - December 2008 .
Women who have another primary cancer diagnosed between the time of breast cancer diagnosis and brain metastasis . . 2 .
Patient has leptomeningeal metastases only without parenchymal brain involvement ( since this pattern of the disease requires a different treatment approach . )
